name: Ancient Medical Bracer

items.alias: Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge
Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge
Ancient Scrap of Spirit Medical Knowledge

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ All parts required for this process can be found in Albtraum. You will need to build an Ancient Engineering Device as well if you do not have one already. A link to this tradeskill process is included #L "Crystalised Memories of a Doctor" "267726" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Surgeon" "267728" #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge" "267677" #L "Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge" "267679" #L "Inactive Ancient Bracer" "267746" #L "Inert Knowledge Crystal" "267737" #L "Ancient Engineering Device" "267751" Note:To build your Ancient Engineering Device, go here: #L "Ancient Engineering Device" "/tell recipe 594" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Crystalised Memories of a Doctor + Crystalised Memories of a Surgeon = #L "Combined Crystalised Medical Memories" "267729" Skills: | 1750 CH | Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge + Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge" "267680" Skills: | 1750 PT | Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge + Combined Crystalised Medical Memories = #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Medical Knowledge" "267727" Skills: | 1750 CH | Ancient Scrap of Spirit Medical Knowledge + Inert Knowledge Crystal = #L "Medical Knowledge Crystal" "267738" Skills: | 1750 CH | Ancient Engineering Device + Inactive Ancient Bracer = #L "Active Ancient Bracer" "267747" Skills: | 1500 ME | Active Ancient Bracer + Medical Knowledge Crystal = #L "Ancient Medical Bracer" "267752" Skills: | 1250 ME |
